interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sayonara
Review Date: 2017/09/18
Store: Marlon Brando  (Actor),     Ricardo Montalban  (Actor),     Joshua Logan  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama
Product Description: ['Product description', 'The story of American servicemen on leave in Japan during the Korean War, and the anguish they suffer after being spurned by both societies for loving Japanese women.', 'Genre:', 'Feature Film-Drama', 'Rating:', 'NR', 'Release Date:', '11-JAN-2005', 'Media Type:', 'DVD', 'Amazon.com', 'Based on a', 'novel', 'by James Michener,', 'Sayonara', "earned a fistful of Oscar® nominations (including Best Picture, Director, and Actor) in 1957 and wound up winning statuettes for supporting actors Red Buttons and Miyoshi Umeki. Marlon Brando plays a Korean War fighter pilot, the son of a general, reassigned to Japan, where fraternization with local women is taboo. After breaking off his engagement to another general's daughter, he finds himself falling for a Japanese entertainer (Miiko Taka), then struggling with his own bias. Subplots deal with other servicemen (played by Buttons and James Garner) who also fall for Japanese women. Directed by Joshua Logan from a script by Paul Osborn, the film takes a then-daring look at prejudice as well as post-war racial bias against the Japanese. Brando's Southern accent makes him sound like Matthew McConaughey, while Buttons is actually touching as tough, tender American struggling against racism.", '--Marshall Fine']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'Closed-captioned, Color, Subtitled, Widescreen, NTSC, Letterboxed', 'Contributor': 'Philip W. Anderson, Miiko Taka, James A. Michener, Reiko Kuba, Red Buttons, Joshua Logan, Patricia Owens, Ellsworth Fredericks, Marlon Brando, Paul Osborn, Soo Yong, Martha Scott, Ricardo Montalban, Kent Smith, Miyoshi Umeki, James Garner, Arthur P. Schmidt, Douglass Watson, William GoetzPhilip W. Anderson, Miiko Taka, James A. Michener, Reiko Kuba, Red Buttons, Joshua Logan, Patricia Owens, Ellsworth Fredericks, Marlon Brando, Paul Osborn, Soo Yong, Martha Scott, Ricardo Montalban, Kent Smith, Miyoshi Umeki, James Garner, Arthur P. Schmidt, Douglass…   See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono), Spanish (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 27 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'Director': 'Joshua Logan', 'Media Format': 'Closed-captioned, Color, Subtitled, Widescreen, NTSC, Letterboxed', 'Run time': '2 hours and 27 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 18, 2001', 'Actors': 'Marlon Brando, Ricardo Montalban, Patricia Owens, James Garner, Martha Scott', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French', 'Producers': 'William Goetz', 'Studio': 'MGM (Video & DVD)', 'Writers': 'James A. Michener, Paul Osborn', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Great movie, one of my favorites. I was probably only 10 when I first saw it.  Thought it was beautiful!!

reference_summary:
Bullitt (DVD) (Rpkg) Steve McQueen (Actor), Robert Vaughn (Actor), Peter Yates (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure ['Bullitt (DVD) (Rpkg)', "There are bad cops and there are good cops ... and then there's Bullitt. Steve McQueen stars as Lt. Frank Bullitt in the role that made him a superstar as the hard-bitten police detective assigned to protect the star witness in a Congressional investigation. But when the witness is murdered, Bullitt mercilessly tracks a trail of lies and corruption that leads all the way to the halls of power in Washington. Steve McQueen performed his own stunts, driving the Ford Mustang in the high-speed pursuit through San Francisco that stands as one of the best and most famous car chases ever filmed.", ']]>'] {'Genre': 'Drama, Mystery & Suspense/Crime, Mystery & Suspense', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dubbed, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': "Norman Fell, Robert Duvall, Don Gordon, Robert Relyea, Steve McQueen, Georg Stanford Brown, Philip D'Antoni, Felice Orlandi, Jacqueline Bisset, Carl Reindel, Peter Yates, Vic Tayback, Simon Oakland, Justin Tarr, Robert VaughnNorman Fell, Robert Duvall, Don Gordon, Robert Relyea, Steve McQueen, Georg Stanford Brown, Philip D'Antoni, Felice Orlandi, Jacqueline Bisset, Carl Reindel, Peter Yates, Vic Tayback, Simon Oakland, Justin Tarr, Robert Vaughn See more", 'Language': 'French (Dolby Digital 1.0), English (Dolby Digital 4.0), Spanish (Mono)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 54 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '164748', 'Director': 'Peter Yates', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dubbed, Full Screen, NTSC, Widescreen, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 54 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 5, 2010', 'Actors': 'Steve McQueen, Robert Vaughn, Jacqueline Bisset, Don Gordon, Robert Duvall', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English, French', 'Producers': "Philip D'Antoni, Robert Relyea", 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} What can I say about Bullitt, one of the best Steve McQueen movies of all time. I know many people like his Great Escape, and so do I, but this movie has it all. Romance, intrigue and a fantastic car chase!!! Especially because it was set in San Francisco, what a place for a car chase. The next best is our modern day "Ronin", but that's a different kind of chase. It's set in Europe, where the street are super narrow. This movie, Bullit, is a great cop movie also. So if by chance you've missed it, it needs to go on your must see list.
Carolyn Gleeson- Lover of Steve McQueen movies in any form. In fact if you like Steve, see his motorcycle documentary,"On any Sunday". Unbelievable!!! Bullitt- must see for car buffs! Luminarias Evelina Fernandez (Actor), Scott Bakula (Actor), Jose Luis Valenzuela (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Comedy {} This is one of my favorite movies. Sort of like a Latina, "Waiting to Exhale". I love the characters and how they explore every facet, whether it's real or a myth about the way people perceive each other. It is funny, poignant and serious all at the same time. And the music is fabulous, the best soundtrack ever. This is a great rainy day movie and one that you will watch over and over again.

On any Sunday-Motorcyle movie extraordinare!!! 47 Ronin Keanu Reeves (Actor), Hiroyuki Sanada (Actor), Carl Rinsch (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure ['Keanu Reeves stars in the action-adventure epic, 47 Ronin. After a treacherous warlord kills their master and banishes their kind, 47 leaderless samurai vow to seek vengeance and reclaim their honor. This band of ronin must seek help from Kai (Reeves)—an enslaved half-breed they once rejected—in their ultimate fight for redemption in a savage world of mythic and wondrous terrors. Kai becomes their most deadly weapon and the heroic inspiration for these outnumbered warriors to confront their enemy and seize eternity.', 'Bonus Content:', 'Deleted Scenes', 'Deleted Scenes', 'Re-forging the Legend', 'Re-forging the Legend', ']]>'] {'Genre': 'revenge movie, movie night, buy movie, DVD movie, Blu-ray movie, fantasy movie, samurai movie, 4K movie, digital movie, Action & Adventure, rent movie, action movie, adventure movierevenge movie, movie night, buy movie, DVD movie, Blu-ray movie, fantasy movie, samurai movie, 4K movie, digital movie, Action & Adventure, rent movie, action movie, adventure movie See more', 'Format': 'Color, Multiple Formats, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Ko Shibasaki, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Hiroyuki Sanada, Min Tanaka, Pamela Abdy, Keanu Reeves, Tadanobu Asano, Carl Rinsch, Hossein Amini, Rinko Kikuchi, Eric McLeod, Chris MorganKo Shibasaki, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Hiroyuki Sanada, Min Tanaka, Pamela Abdy, Keanu Reeves, Tadanobu Asano, Carl Rinsch, Hossein Amini, Rinko Kikuchi, Eric McLeod, Chris Morgan See more', 'Initial release date': '2014-04-01', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': '29093346', 'Director': 'Carl Rinsch', 'Media Format': 'Color, Multiple Formats, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 59 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 1, 2014', 'Actors': 'Keanu Reeves, Hiroyuki Sanada, Tadanobu Asano, Rinko Kikuchi, Ko Shibasaki', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French', 'Producers': 'Pamela Abdy, Eric McLeod', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Chris Morgan, Hossein Amini', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} 47 Ronin wonderful movie, a bit of history, a bit of Sci fi, fantasy and a real spectacle. Really enjoyed it.

Carolyn G 47 Ronin Despicable Me 2 Steve Carell (Actor), Kristen Wiig (Actor), Chris Renaud (Director), Pierre Coffin (Director) & 1 more Rated: PG Format: DVD Movies & TV, Award Winners in Movies & TV, Oscar Central, Past Oscar Winners ['Product Description', 'Gru, his adorable girls, and the mischievous Minions are back with a cast of unforgettable new characters in the blockbuster sequel to the worldwide phenomenon. Just as Gru has given up being super-bad to be a super-dad, the Anti-Villain League recruits him to track down a new criminal mastermind and save the world. Partnered with secret agent Lucy Wilde, Gru, along with the wildly unpredictable Minions, must figure out how to keep his cover while also keeping up with his duties as a father. Assemble the Minions for laugh-out-loud comedy in "one of the funniest, most enjoyable movies ever!" (MovieGuide).', 'There are multiple versions of this movie cover and each shipment is random. Customers are not guaranteed to receive a specific cover or to receive different covers with multiple purchases.', 'Amazon.com', "Sticky doesn't begin to describe Gru's new life: the ex-supervillain has given up his villainous ways and he and Dr. Nefario (Russell Brand) have settled into the legitimate business of making jellies and jams with the help of his army of minions. Parenting is no less sticky, and the fact that Gru will go to any length to ensure the happiness of his adopted girls Agnes, Edith, and Margo is evident by the elaborate birthday party he's throwing for Agnes that includes a live unicorn and a princess named Gruzinkerbell. Anti-Villain League operative Lucy Wild (Kristen Wiig) kidnaps Gru after the party, using an arsenal of spy gadgetry that would make James Bond jealous, and the agency solicits his help in apprehending a criminal who's made an entire secret lab disappear from the Arctic Circle and stolen a dangerous transmutation formula. The lure of excitement tempts Gru, and he and Lucy set up an undercover operation in a bakery in Paradise Mall, the minions start cranking out cupcakes, and Gru and Lucy begin investigating their fellow business owners. Meanwhile, Agnes pines for a mother, Margo finds her first boyfriend, Dr. Nefario takes a more exciting job, a slew of minions go missing, and Gru staunchly refuses to enter the dating scene. Little does Gru know that his whole life is about to change once again. The minions and their antics are quite funny in this second film, and, for the 10-and-under crowd, they completely steal the show. For the older crowd, the film does a decent job of further developing Gru's character and provides lots of comedic material in the exaggeration of the many challenges of parenthood as well as through the wacky exploits of the minions. (Ages 6 and older)", '--Tami Horiuchi'] {'Genre': 'Kids & Family, Animation, Comedy', 'Format': 'Animated, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Elsie Kate Fisher, Steve Carell, Nasim Pedrad, Christopher Meledandri, Pierre Coffin, Ken Jeong, Ken Daurio, Dana Gaier, Cinco Paul, Chris Renaud, Gregory Perler, Janet Healy, Benjamin Bratt, Miranda Cosgrove, Moises Arias, Kristen Wiig, Russell Brand, Steve CooganElsie Kate Fisher, Steve Carell, Nasim Pedrad, Christopher Meledandri, Pierre Coffin, Ken Jeong, Ken Daurio, Dana Gaier, Cinco Paul, Chris Renaud, Gregory Perler, Janet Healy, Benjamin Bratt, Miranda Cosgrove, Moises Arias, Kristen Wiig, Russell Brand, Steve Coogan See more', 'Initial release date': '2013-12-10', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Unqualified (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'D61120669D', 'Director': 'Chris Renaud, Pierre Coffin', 'Media Format': 'Animated, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 38 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 10, 2013', 'Actors': 'Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Benjamin Bratt, Ken Jeong, Miranda Cosgrove', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French', 'Producers': 'Christopher Meledandri, Janet Healy', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Cinco Paul, Ken Daurio', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Love the Minions, so this is a favorite of mine.

Carolyn G. Five Stars Lucy Scarlett Johansson (Actor), Morgan Freeman (Actor), Luc Besson (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Science Fiction ['From La Femme Nikita and The Professional to The Fifth Element, writer/director Luc Besson has created some of the toughest, most memorable female action heroes in cinematic history. Now, Besson directs Scarlett Johansson in Lucy, an action-thriller that tracks a woman accidentally caught in a dark deal who turns the tables on her captors and transforms into a merciless warrior evolved beyond human logic. Lucy also stars Academy Award winner Morgan Freeman.'] {'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 5.4 x 7.5 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '61131844', 'Director': 'Luc Besson', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 20, 2015', 'Actors': 'Scarlett Johansson, Morgan Freeman, Min-Sik Choi', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish, French', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), Unknown (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Loved this movie, more interesting then i first expected. Great food for thought.

Carolyn G. Five Stars The Bridges at Toko-Ri William Holden (Actor), Grace Kelly (Actor), Mark Robson (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama ['Product description', 'Bridges at Toko-Ri (Full Screen) (Bilingual)', 'Amazon.com', 'A powerful study of courage in the face of irrational odds,', 'The Bridges at Toko-Ri', "(based on James Michener's novel) is no less patriotic than many other war films, but it dispenses with gung-ho bluster to focus instead on the very real and tragic consequences of war. This is also one of the first films to openly criticize the morality of the Korean War while praising the honor and integrity of the men who fought it. Lt. Harry Brubaker (William Holden) is one of those men, with one difference: A lawyer with a loving wife (Grace Kelly) and two young daughters, he's been recalled to duty from the Navy Reserve, and reluctantly accepts his mission to fly with a bomber-jet squadron over one of the Communists' most heavily protected targets--the strategically vital bridges in the Korean canyon of Toko-Ri.", "Brubaker has his own noble protection, from his fellow pilots (including Charles McGraw in a fine supporting role), his admiring admiral (Frederic March), and from the helicopter scouts (Mickey Rooney and Earl Holliman) who've saved his life on previous missions. But his ambivalence--and his fear that the Toko-Ri mission will be his last--is what gives the film its potent emotional impact. Holden is perfect in his role, and director Mark Robson steadfastly avoids any false sentiment or macho theatrics that would diminish the film's devastating climax.", 'The Bridges at Toko-Ri', 'is also a superlative showcase for Naval operations; the aerial sequences earned an Oscar for special effects, and complete Navy cooperation assures total authenticity in the "flat-top" aircraft carrier scenes. For these and other reasons, this will remain a timeless classic for anyone seeking to comprehend the emotional maelstrom of warfare.', '--Jeff Shannon'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.25 x 0.5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Mark Robson', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 42 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 22, 2001', 'Actors': 'William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March, Mickey Rooney, Robert Strauss', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono)', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Writers': 'James Michener, Valentine Davies', 'Number of discs': '1'} Great old classic.

Loved it.

Carolyn G. The Bridges of Toko-Ri The Tigger Movie: Bounce-A-Rrrific Special Edition Jim Cummings (Actor), Nikita Hopkins (Actor), Jun Falkenstein (Director, Writer) & 0 more Rated: G Format: DVD Movies & TV, Fully Loaded DVDs, Special Editions ['Celebrate family, friendship and the eternal magic of childhood with this beloved Disney classic. Back to delight a whole new generation of fans, THE TIGGER MOVIE bounces onto Blu-ray high definition for the first time ever! Join Tigger on an epic journey to find other Tiggers in his "family tree." Then, share the wonder when, after a series of exciting adventures, he discovers that families come in all shapes and sizes! Both the young and the young-at-heart will love this must-own, collectible masterpiece filled with original songs by the award-winning Sherman Brothers (MARY POPPINS). Featuring all-new, never-before-seen bonus, this Special Edition of THE TIGGER MOVIE is tremendous, tiggerrific fun your entire family will treasure now and always.'] {'Genre': 'Preschool', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Animated, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Jun Falkenstein, Kath Soucie, Nikita Hopkins, Ken Sansom, John Fiedler, Peter Cullen, Jim Cummings, Andrew Stojka, Tom AttenboroughJun Falkenstein, Kath Soucie, Nikita Hopkins, Ken Sansom, John Fiedler, Peter Cullen, Jim Cummings, Andrew Stojka, Tom Attenborough See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), French (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 17 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'G (General Audience)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WD10966800DVD', 'Director': 'Jun Falkenstein', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Animated, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 17 minutes', 'Release date': 'August 21, 2012', 'Actors': 'Jim Cummings, Nikita Hopkins, Ken Sansom, John Fiedler, Peter Cullen', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Walt Disney Video', 'Writers': 'Jun Falkenstein', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} A good movie, but not as fun as the Winne the Pooh and the search for Christopher Robin, that one is awesome. but everyone loves Tigger.

But I'm looking for some newer movies, circa, 2011 and later for my Grandson.

Carolyn G The Tigger Movie review Indiana Jones Raiders of the Lost ARK Anthony Higgins (Actor), Ronald Lacey (Actor), Steven Spielberg (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure ['Product Description', "Action-packed and adventure-filled, RAIDERS OF THE LOST ARK is director Steven Spielberg's loving homage to the Saturday matinee cliffhanger serials of his childhood. When the Allies discover the Nazis are planning to use the Lost Ark of the Covenant as a weapon, the U.S. government enlists archaeologist-adventurer Indiana Jones (Harrison Ford) to locate the biblical treasure chest where the remains of the broken tablets of the Ten Commandments were placed. Director Steven Spielberg Star Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, Ronald Lacey, John Rhys-Davies, Denholm Elliott, Alfred Molina Special Features: Anamorphic Widescreen Audio: Dolby Digital Stereo English Runtime: 115 minutes.", 'Amazon.com', 'It’s said that the original is the greatest, and there can be no more vivid proof than', 'Raiders of the Lost Ark', ', the first and indisputably best of the initial three Indiana Jones adventures cooked up by the dream team of Steven Spielberg and George Lucas. Expectations were high for this 1981 collaboration between the two men, who essentially invented the box office blockbuster with ‘70s efforts like', 'Jaws', 'and', 'Star Wars', ', and Spielberg (who directed) and Lucas (who co-wrote the story and executive produced) didn’t disappoint. This wildly entertaining film has it all: non-stop action, exotic locations, grand spectacle, a hero for the ages, despicable villains, a beautiful love interest, humor, horror… not to mention lots of snakes. And along with all the bits that are so familiar by now--Indy (Harrison Ford) running from the giant boulder in a cave, using his pistol instead of his trusty whip to take out a scimitar-wielding bad guy, facing off with a hissing cobra, and on and on--there’s real resonance in a potent storyline that brings together a profound religious-archaeological icon (the Ark of the Covenant, nothing less than "a radio for speaking to God") and the 20th century’s most infamous criminals (the Nazis). Now', 'that’s', 'entertainment.', '--Sam Graham', 'Set Contains:', 'This is hardly the first time that', 'Raiders', 'and the other two original Indiana Jones movies have been released on DVD, but a raft of new special features will sweeten the pot for those who already own it. Principal among them are an introduction with Spielberg (who discusses his vision for a globe-trotting, James Bond-style action movie in the mold of an old Republic serial) and Lucas (who came up with the title character); an "appreciation" of the trilogy with many of the actors and others who participated in them; a mini-doc detailing the "melting face" effect seen in the thrilling ark-opening scene, plus storyboards and a photo gallery. --', 'Sam Graham', 'See more'] {'Genre': 'Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dubbed, NTSC, Dolby, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Harrison Ford, Alfred Molina, Vic Tablian, Wolf Kahler, Steven Spielberg, Ronald Lacey, John Rhys-Davies, Anthony Higgins, Paul Freeman, Denholm Elliott, Frank Marshall, Karen AllenHarrison Ford, Alfred Molina, Vic Tablian, Wolf Kahler, Steven Spielberg, Ronald Lacey, John Rhys-Davies, Anthony Higgins, Paul Freeman, Denholm Elliott, Frank Marshall, Karen Allen See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Unqualified, French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), Spanish (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 55 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '132824', 'Director': 'Steven Spielberg', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dubbed, NTSC, Dolby, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 55 minutes', 'Release date': 'June 5, 2013', 'Actors': 'Anthony Higgins, Ronald Lacey, Denholm Elliott, Paul Freeman, Harrison Ford', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, French', 'Studio': 'Paramount Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'} Who doesn't love this movie??? it started us all on the adventure into the unknown. Hasn't everyone at one time or anther wished that they were an archaeologist??? Find the treasure?? the gold the Mummy's tombs, filled with treasures??? Of course.and this was my introduction to Karen Allen, Awesome actress. She's also stars in my favorite foreign film called " Until September". She's an American young woman who gets accidentally stranded in the Charles De Gaulle airport and misses her plane. The great romance that every young woman wants to have in Paris!!! check it out.

Carolyn G. Indiana Jones & the Raiders of the Lost Ark. The Lion Guard: Return of the Roar Max Charles (Actor), Rob Lowe (Actor) Format: DVD Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, All Disney Titles ['Product Description', 'Meet Kion, second-born cub of Simba and Nala, as he assumes the role of leader of "The Lion Guard," an elite team of animals tasked with preserving the Pride Lands. Follow him as he assembles a group of unlikely heroes: Bunga the honey badger, Fuli the cheetah, Beshte the hippo and Ono the egret. Join them on a thrilling adventure as they use their unique abilities to defend the Pride Lands from predators and maintain balance within the Circle of Life. Bursting with humor, music, beloved characters and heart, THE LION GUARD: RETURN OF THE ROAR is a must-own for the entire family!', 'Additional Features', 'Digital HD is not included with this product.'] {'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '13407100', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '44 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 23, 2016', 'Actors': 'Max Charles, Rob Lowe, Dusan Brown, Sarah Hyland, Khary Payton', 'Dubbed': 'French', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), French', 'Studio': 'Walt Disney Studios', 'Number of discs': '1'} My Grandson is almost 3 years old. and he loves this movie The Lion Guard, return of the Roar. He is obsessed. So Grandma had to buy it
so that when he comes over he can watch it.
CarolynG. The Lion Guard, a wonderful movie. Until September Richard Marquand (Director), Karen Allen (Actor), Thierry Lhermitte (Actor) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: DVD Movies & TV, MGM Home Entertainment, All MGM Titles ["Mo Alexander's bad luck is that she misses the plane in Paris carrying her tour group and her luggage. On top of this, she finds that it will take several days for the travel agent to work out the problem. In the meantime, Mo meets Xavier, a true Parisian, who sees Mo as an opportunity to enjoy himself while his family is out of town. Mo reluctantly begins an affair with him, and finds herself wrestling with her conscience. For Xavier, Mo is a challenge to his cultural identity making it difficult to dismiss her. They enjoy a beautiful physical and emotional relationship, and in the end, being in love with Mo has the ability alter Xavier on a fundamental level."] {'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Richard Marquand, Thierry Lhermitte, Karen Allen', 'Language': 'Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.66:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.42 x 0.58 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Director': 'Richard Marquand', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Actors': 'Karen Allen, Thierry Lhermitte', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'MGM (Video & DVD)'} This is a great woman's romance movie. Well cast and well acted., the dialogue is very real, and the main actor Thierry is so gorgeous to look at.
We all would wish to be stranded in Paris with him!!! Until September Sayonara Marlon Brando (Actor), Ricardo Montalban (Actor), Joshua Logan (Director) & 0 more Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama ['Product description', 'The story of American servicemen on leave in Japan during the Korean War, and the anguish they suffer after being spurned by both societies for loving Japanese women.', 'Genre:', 'Feature Film-Drama', 'Rating:', 'NR', 'Release Date:', '11-JAN-2005', 'Media Type:', 'DVD', 'Amazon.com', 'Based on a', 'novel', 'by James Michener,', 'Sayonara', "earned a fistful of Oscar® nominations (including Best Picture, Director, and Actor) in 1957 and wound up winning statuettes for supporting actors Red Buttons and Miyoshi Umeki. Marlon Brando plays a Korean War fighter pilot, the son of a general, reassigned to Japan, where fraternization with local women is taboo. After breaking off his engagement to another general's daughter, he finds himself falling for a Japanese entertainer (Miiko Taka), then struggling with his own bias. Subplots deal with other servicemen (played by Buttons and James Garner) who also fall for Japanese women. Directed by Joshua Logan from a script by Paul Osborn, the film takes a then-daring look at prejudice as well as post-war racial bias against the Japanese. Brando's Southern accent makes him sound like Matthew McConaughey, while Buttons is actually touching as tough, tender American struggling against racism.", '--Marshall Fine'] {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'Closed-captioned, Color, Subtitled, Widescreen, NTSC, Letterboxed', 'Contributor': 'Philip W. The user remains a dedicated film enthusiast with a profound appreciation for classic action and adventure films, particularly those featuring iconic actors like Steve McQueen and Harrison Ford. Their interests have expanded to include character-driven comedies that explore complex dynamics, poignant themes, and classic and contemporary sports films. A notable shift towards science fiction highlights their attraction to strong female protagonists in action-packed stories, alongside their continued fondness for emotionally resonant classic dramas.

Furthermore, the user has developed an appreciation for romantic narratives that prioritize authentic dialogue and character depth, favoring well-crafted romance films. Their love for animated features resonates with their comedic tastes and desire for character-rich storytelling. The user's interest in family-oriented films reflects a commitment to content that appeals to a wide audience while offering heartfelt narratives.

Recently, their admiration for classic dramas has been reinforced through interactions with films that tackle significant social issues and feature iconic performances, as exemplified by their review of a beloved film from the past. Overall, the user embodies a well-rounded film aficionado eager to explore diverse narratives while nurturing a passion for timeless classics and captivating adventures suitable for personal enjoyment and family viewing experiences.
